label: 副島種臣
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: そえじま たねおみ
説明文: (1828-1905). Hizen samurai; family with kokugaku connections. Student of Rangaku, later English (with Okuma Shigenobu). Loyalist sympathizer; came into prominence as Hizen representative in early Meiji govenment; diplomatic specialist; later cabinet minister.
